Lesson moving forward:
1.Even when its not in the news,the virus is still here
2.Try to stay home more
3.If you decide to go out try for smaller groups & outdoors 
4.Take extra measures to protect those in your life at higher risk
5.Wash your hands & use a mask more
3/3

You use mask at CVS & Publix but no one is wearing a mask or is 6ft away at a pool party or gettogether.

But then a few days later you learn someone you were around tested positive so you go get tested.

If your negative,you feel “clean” & keep hanging out. 2/3

As resident of #Florida I can explain surge.After weeks in lockdown you want to go back to being human.The news isn’t about virus anymore so you start hanging out with people again. And not just at bars,but at each other’s home etc. Normal human stuff 1/3
